explanation: The stage direction describes a sequence of actions involving multiple characters getting up to view the cabinet, as well as mentioning them taking several bourgeois who are in the corners. This has a narrative quality, as it conveys an action set in a larger context rather than simply stating individual actions.
stgdir: La bouteille d'Aï achevée, la Marquise, le Chevalier, le Président, Eglante, le Baron se lèvent pour aller voir le cabinet. Ils prennent plusieurs bourgeois qui sont sur les encoignures.
